query:
select lists.id, title, content,
                count(links.dest_bookmark_id) as "bookmark_count!",
                count(links.dest_list_id) as "linked_list_count!"
            from lists
            left join links
                on lists.id = links.src_list_id
            where lists.ap_user_id = $1 and not pinned
            group by lists.id
